issue.title: [Java] Support concating validity bits efficiently
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7072](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7072). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
For scenarios when we need to concate vectors (like the scenario in ARROW-7048, and delta dictionary), we need a way to concat validity bits. 

Currently, we have bit level API to read/write individual validity bit. However, it is not efficient , and we need a way to copy more bits at a time.
